snippet: Thieves ripped a safe from the wall of a hotel room near the Cannes Film Festival and made off with around $1 million worth of jewelry.
abstract: Thieves rip a safe from wall of a hotel room near Cannes Film Festival in Cannes, France, and make off with around $1 million worth of jewelry.
lead_paragraph: Thieves ripped a safe from the wall of a hotel room near the Cannes Film Festival and made off with around $1 million worth of jewelry.

headline.print_headline: Just Like a Movie: Jewel Heist at Cannes
